last_episode_to_air.name: The Masterplan
last_episode_to_air.overview: Fueled by rage, Gurnaam seeks to avenge his parents' death. But as a deceptive truth surfaces, new dangers threaten to upend his life.

name: CAT
overview: Living under an alias, a former police informant is summoned to infiltrate a major drug empire but uncovers a dangerous connection to his dark past.

episodes.name: The Deal
episodes.overview: After his brother is arrested in a drug bust, a desperate Gurnaam Singh agrees to work with police. As elections approach, a deadly plot is hatched.

episodes.name: The Invasion
episodes.overview: Past tragedies continue to haunt Gurnaam. After infiltrating Madam Aulakh's inner circle, he goes after Mukhtiyaar Singh, a major drug supplier.

episodes.name: The Imposter
episodes.overview: Leading a double life, Gurnaam leaks information to police while staying close to Laadi. A police raid threatens to jeopardize his cover.

episodes.name: The Takeover
episodes.overview: A deadly fight ensues when Gurnaam's identity is compromised. Kimi's interest in singer Rocky grows while drawing Madam Aulakh's ire.

episodes.name: The Crossroad
episodes.overview: Madam Aulakh's horrifying past — and rise to power — is revealed. As the gang hunts for the source of a new drug, Gurnaam makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: The Escape
episodes.overview: As a despondent Sunny struggles to cope, Gurnaam anxiously attempts to get his brother out of the country and turns to Sehtab Singh for help.

episodes.name: The Deceit
episodes.overview: An unlikely family connection emerges, while a figure from Sehtab's past returns. Later, Madam Aulakh makes a proposal to Gurnaam.

episodes.name: The Masterplan
episodes.overview: Fueled by rage, Gurnaam seeks to avenge his parents' death. But as a deceptive truth surfaces, new dangers threaten to upend his life.
